title: The Macaroni Rascals in Studio (feat. Mike Vecchione & Greg Stone)
description:
Mike Vecchione and Greg Stone join The Bonfire and tell us about their new podcast Macaroni Rascals and Greg shares how he is adjusting to being a brand new father!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM 

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayComedy.com

@ComicMikeV www.MikeVecchione.com

@GregStone_ www.youtube.com/GregStoneComedy
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (greg stone, mike vecchione)
